en.intro_1: The ocean covers almost 70% of the Earth's surface...
en.intro_2: and most of it still remains unexplored.
en.intro_3: Exploring the ocean is no easy task, as it's a place brimming with as much danger as there is mystery.
en.intro_4: For those brave enough to take on this challenge, we use a special process to uncover these mysteries:
en.title: Triton's Treasure
en.subtitle: A Scientific Method Adventure
en.desc_shell: Also known as Triton's Trumpet. This one can talk for some reason.
en.desc_shark: One of the largest predator fish.
en.ch1-dialog_1-5: Yes, what are you doing here?
en.ch1-dialog_1-7: Yes, I can talk...it's really not a big deal. Now answer me.
en.ch1-dialog_1-8: These waters are not very safe for humans, why are you here?
en.ch1-dialog_1-9: I want to explore and learn about the deep ocean.
en.ch1-dialog_2-1: I am an ocean explorer. My job is to venture into the unknown and make discoveries using the Scientific Method.
en.ch1-dialog_sm-1: It's a process we use to make sense about the world around us. It involves:
en.ch1-dialog_sm-7: Then finally, coming up with a conclusion.
en.ch1-dialog_3-1: I'm very curious about the unknown things and unusual creatures that live in the deep ocean.
en.ch1-dialog_3-2: By making new discoveries and sharing them with the world, maybe we can understand the ocean better.
en.ch1-dialog_3-3: That way, we'll not only learn how to use the ocean's resources more wisely, but also how to protect it.
en.ch1-dialog_3-5: ...very well. I'll help you on your journey.
en.ch1-dialog_4-1: You have no idea where to go, or what lurks in these depths, do you?
en.ch1-dialog_4-3: Then let me guide you. I know these waters like the back of my shell.
en.ch1-dialog_shark_2-1: I won't let you destroy anything here. Get lost human!
en.ch1-dialog_shark_2-2: Wait, this one won't hurt you. They're just here to learn.
en.ch1-dialog_shark_2-3: I don't care! Leave now or I'll make you leave!
en.ch1-dialog_shark_2-4: What is it saying? He looks kinda angry...
en.ch1-dialog_shark_2-5: Run now! If you don't want to be shark food!
